nouns: The national flag of the United States of America, often referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars alternating with rows of five stars.

description: The flag for U.S. Outlying Islands, which may show as the letters UM on some platforms. This is the same flag as the United States.
